mapper.insert: insert into big_goal (bigGoal_number, bigGoal_name, bigGoal_startDate, bigGoal_endDate, user_id) values (big_goal_seq.NEXTVAL, #{bigGoal_name}, #{bigGoal_startDate}, #{bigGoal_endDate}, #{user_id})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM big_goal WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY bigGoal_number

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM big_goal WHERE bigGoal_state = 'ongoing' AND user_id = #{userId}) AS ongoing_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM big_goal WHERE bigGoal_state = 'completed' AND user_id = #{userId}) AS completed_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM big_goal WHERE bigGoal_endDate < SYSDATE AND user_id = #{userId}) AS overdue_count FROM dual
SELECT * FROM small_goal WHERE bigGoal_number = #{bigGoal_number} ORDER BY smallGoal_number
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO small_goal (smallGoal_number, smallGoal_name, smallGoal_startDate, smallGoal_endDate, bigGoal_number) VALUES (small_goal_seq.NEXTVAL, #{smallGoal_name}, #{smallGoal_startDate}, #{smallGoal_endDate}, #{bigGoal_number})
mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM small_goal WHERE smallGoal_check = 'ongoing' AND bigGoal_number = #{bigGoal_number}) AS ongoing_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM small_goal WHERE smallGoal_check = 'complete' AND bigGoal_number = #{bigGoal_number}) AS completed_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM small_goal WHERE smallGoal_startDate > SYSDATE AND bigGoal_number = #{bigGoal_number}) AS UpComingGoal_count FROM dual
SELECT bigGoal_endDate - SYSDATE AS Dday FROM big_goal where bigGoal_number = #{bigGoal_number}
SELECT smallGoal_endDate - SYSDATE AS Dday FROM small_goal where smallGoal_number = #{smallGoal_number}
mapper.update:

bigGoal_name = #{bigGoal_name},
